edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.model
Class UIDbHelper

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.model.UIDbHelper

public class UIDbHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class serves as an access layer of the database for Omnidroid's UI data model representation. TODO(ehotou) Consider throwing exceptions when db operations failed.

public UIDbHelper(Context context)
Method Detail

close

public void close()
Close the UIDbHelper. UI needs to call this method when it is done with the database connection. UIDbHelper is not usable after calling this method.

deleteRule

public void deleteRule(long ruleID)
Delete a rule record as well as ruleAction, ruleActionParameter and ruleFilters records associated with it.

Parameters:
ruleID - is id of the rule to be delete
